footerDisplay:
Created by @Knilo. 

All config details can be obtained using `node palGateCli.js config` command.

name.title: Platform Name
name.description: The name of the platform instance.

token.title: Session Token
token.description: The session token generated during device linking.

tokenType.title: Token Type
tokenType.description: Set to 0 for SMS, 1 for Primary linking, or 2 for Secondary linking.

accessoryType.title: Default Accessory Type
accessoryType.description: The default type for discovered gates. Default is 'garageDoor'.

customGates.title: Custom Gate Settings
customGates.description: Optional overrides for individual gates. Each object in this array can specify custom settings for a gate.

deviceId.title: Gate ID
deviceId.description: The unique ID of the gate.

name.title: Custom Gate Name
name.description: A custom name for the gate.

garageDoor.title: Expose as Garage Door
garageDoor.description: Set to true to expose this gate as a garage door.

switch.title: Expose as Switch
switch.description: Set to true to expose this gate as a switch.

hide.title: Hide Gate
hide.description: Set to true to hide this gate from HomeKit.
